title: Yamaha eyes 20% volume growth
description: The company, which is expecting to close this year with sales of about 650,000 units, said it has seen strong recovery in customer sentiments after the pandemic and buoyant demand in the country would help offset weak volumes overseas, where inflationary pressures are expected to drag down numbers.
